name: Ascend (LofiCacti)
description:
You were born in the darkness. You and your people live underground, guided by the Elders, who teach that the sun stopped setting long ago.

Your Elders have warned the curious that the sunlight blinds. That the Surface is inhospitable.

You aren't convinced. You have decided to make your ascent.

Use whatever means you can to reach the Surface. There multiple ways to complete this short game.

Mechanic: A single with Multiple Problems and Multiple Solutions

Theme: The Sun Won't Set (Reprise)
